message.body: Yes!! You should come with Scotty and his 2 friends from home and I to the Heart of the Beast show "There's Nothing To Tell"! Only 5 bucks :)
Orrrrr the new Disney movie..... Hahahaha
Lol - I think Scotty already bought the tix. My friend you met on new years at cole's Dan Dukich is in it and his friend who had a fullbright doing shadow puppetry in china is the creator.
Ohhhhhhh gawd that's so cool. Ok you got me bc that's brilliant haha and yes drinks and movie in the morn :) yayyyyyy I love to
I would go to the Disney movie sat morning if you decide you wanna change the plan. But you certainly don't have to. As long as we have some drinks together after!!
Yay!!!!!! Love YOU and so excited for all those amazing things holy shit.

Babbbbyyyyy I have tickets for Jason Eric and I for the puppets! Epic. Also, trav just told me he doesn't have room for me.... What a darling. So I'm sorry to impose but could I grab a spot on your couch? Let me know if not and I'll work something out
YOU'RE THE BEST I LOVE YOU
You know it starts at 7, yeah?
